    • Uses of MongoStoreInvocationContext in org.keycloak.connections.mongo.impl.context

      Classes in org.keycloak.connections.mongo.impl.context that implement MongoStoreInvocationContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleMongoStoreInvocationContext
      Context, which is not doing any postponing of tasks and does not cache anything
      class  TransactionMongoStoreInvocationContext
      Invocation context, which has some very basic support for transactions, and is able to cache loaded objects.
